translation: Others offer as sacrifice the outgoing breath into the incoming, and the incoming into the outgoing, restraining the flow of the outgoing and the incoming breaths, solely absorbed in the restraint of the breath.
commentary: 4.29 Apane in the outgoing breath? Juhvati sacrifice? Pranam incoming breath? Prane in the incoming breath? Apana outgoing breath? And thus? Other others? Pranapanagati courses of the outgoing and incoming breaths? Closing restraining? Pranayamaparayanah solely absorbed in the restraint of breath.Commentary Some Yogis practice Puraka (inhalation)? some Yogis practice Rechaka (exhalation)?,and some
